recipesJson.name: OFF THE RECORD  Raw Power (clone) remix
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: Raw power ejuice is described as a creamy butterscotch,vanilla, caramel coffee with tobacco and hints of hazelnut .This is one of the first commercial brands I was vaping some years back . Purilum caramel coffee with sweet milk is hands down one of the best IMO and a perfect choice for this mix.Flavorah Tatanka tobacco has some darker notes that blend well with it and just a touch of butterscotch and Vienna Cream along with vanilla Swirl to blend it all together.

pageContext.name: OFF THE RECORD  Raw Power (clone) remix
